reference: 1. Target growth ranges chosen in July 1979 for 1978-4 to 1979-4 were of 1-1/2% to 4-1/2% for Ml, 5 to 8% for M2, 6 to 9% for M3. They have remained approximately the same since.
4. This characterization ignores the second aspect of the policy change, that is the change in the feedback rule.
